name: Christmas Tree Blitz - Knock Down the Ornaments!
name_original: Christmas Tree Blitz - Knock Down the Ornaments!
description:
Just in time for Christmas!

You have to tap each ornament as fast as you can and knock them off the Christmas tree before the time runs out! The further you get, more and more ornaments get added to the tree. The ornaments get smaller each level. The faster you knock them all off, the more points you will get. But be careful! You don't want to touch the leafs on the tree or you'll lose points.

Challenge your friends and family to see who can get the highest score!
